body.name: Gigabyte B550 Gaming X V2 (AMD Ryzen 5000/B550/ATX/M.2/HDMI/DVI/USB 3.1 Gen 2/DDR4/ATX/Gaming Motherboard)
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: Supports AMD 3rd Gen Ryzen and 3rd Gen Ryzen with Radeon Graphics Processors
Dual Channel ECC/ Non-ECC Unbuffered DDR4, 4 DIMMs
10+3 Phases Digital Twin Power Design with Low RDS(on) MOSFETs
Ultra Durable PCIe 4.0 Ready x16 Slot
Dual Ultra-Fast NVMe PCIe 4.0/3.0 x4 M.2 Connectors
body.description: Supports AMD 3rd Gen Ryzen and 3rd Gen Ryzen with Radeon Graphics Processors Dual Channel ECC/ Non-ECC Unbuffered DDR4, 4 DIMMs 10+3 Phases Digital Twin Power Design with Low RDS(on) MOSFETs Ultra Durable PCIe 4.0 Ready x16 Slot Dual Ultra-Fast NVMe PCIe 4.0/3.0 x4 M.2 Connectors GIGABYTE Exclusive 8118 Gaming LAN with Bandwidth Management Front USB 3.2 Gen1 Type-C and HDMI & DVI-D for Multiple Display High Quality Audio Capacitors and Audio Noise Guard for Ultimate Audio Quality RGB FUSION 2.0 support Addressable LED & RGB LED Strips Smart Fan 5 Features Multiple Temperature Sensors , Hybrid Fan Headers with FAN STOP Q-Flash Plus Update BIOS without Installing the CPU, Memory and Graphics Card Anti-Sulfur Resistors Design

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 499 ratings 4.5 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Motherboard BIOS update for AMD Ryzen 5000 series processors Motherboard BIOS update for AMD Ryzen 5000 series processors From GIGABYTE’s website, download the latest compressed BIOS update file that matches your motherboard model from its product page.Uncompress the downloaded BIOS file, save it to your USB flash drive, and rename it to GIGABYTE.bin. Note: The USB flash drive must use the FAT32/16 file system.Insert the USB flash drive into the white USB port or BIOS Q Flash port on the back panel of your motherboard (USB port may not be labelled on all models, checking the user manual is recommended)Connect the power cables to the CPU 8 Pin power connector (connect either one if there are two) and mainboard 24 Pin power connector.Press the Q-Flash Plus button (location may vary by model) and the system will automatically search and match the BIOS file in the USB flash drive on the white USB port. The QFLED and the Q-Flash Plus button on the rear panel will flash during the BIOS matching and flashing process. Wait for 2-3 minutes and the QFLED will stop flashing when the BIOS flashing is complete.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good price, works with Linux
reviews.reviewText: The board works well. We did encounter a couple of problems while setting it up.First, there was a message about something being corrupted related to the AMD version of TPM. When we pressed the indicated keys, nothing happened.We tried rebooting the system, but the error stayer.Then we removed all power for a few seconds. When we powered it back up, it had the same error, but it DID respond to keystrokes.Next, it wouldn't boot to Linux. This was the existing install which worked OK on the old motherboard.The BIOS recognized the multiple boot failures, and suggested letting it set standard defaults. We did that, and it booted to Linux.The old Gigabyte motherboard lasted 11 years before flakiness started occurring, and I expect this will last that long, too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked perfectly, no issues, workarounds, just works.
reviews.reviewText: Bought this motherboard to upgrade my sons aging Intel build and bring him up to date with more modern hardware. Basically, I built him a new computer from the ground up. I opted for a Ryzen 4600G with exceptional silicon (actually boosts as high as 6100mhz for short durations). 32Gb of RAM, 1Tb Nvme main drive with a 4Tb spinning dino-drive as mass storage. Ditched the cheapo cooler the 4600G came with for something with a much higher TDP. Using a RX 6650 XT for graphics with a 1080p monitor. This does everything he wants to do. Including live-streaming gaming. He's happy, I'm happy, everybody is happy.That said, my own recent build used a Gigabyte motherboard as well. That is why I used a Gigabyte board for his build. I'm really impressed with the quality of Gigabyte recently. I have no brand loyalty at all. I look around and see who is providing what level of quality for the dollar and go with the one who offers the most bang for the buck. Recently, Gigabyte has been killing it with motherboards.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I just recently began building a pc and got this motherboard for sale from black Friday! Its a great motherboard and the only thing I’ll say is that it doesn't have built in wifi. I should've done a little bit more research but its also fairly simple to just go to best buy and get a little wifi converter!! Overall, great product!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for price
reviews.reviewText: This motherboard is a beast for the price. Supports 2 NVME m.2 ssds. My only complaint is the first boot. The first boot takes a while and lead me to believe it was defective. I simply waited 15 minutes and it was fine. Ever sense then it has been speedy fast.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s a great motherboard, it’s been smooth and easy to work with. There’s plenty of RAM, and PCIe slots too. And built in WiFi, which is always a bonus

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Everything thing installed easily when I built it and was installing the parts

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Pedido llegó usado
reviews.reviewText: El pedido llegó en una bolsa de Amazon, al momento de abrir, se ve que la caja no tiene precinto, dentro de la caja solo se encontraba la placa madre sin documentación, disco de drivers ni cables sata. Cómo se ve la placa ni viene con plásticos, la bolsa se ve muy manipulada. Claramente es un producto de segunda mano

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Haven’t had a single issue with this board for a month and it works as it should. BIOS is really good as always with gigabyte.

reviews.reviewTitle: WiFi no good, board is fine
reviews.reviewText: Great board, but the WiFi 6 was very slow. I swapped boards to aorus model, and wifi was working fine with that one pushing my correct upload and download speeds

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Voor een mooie prijs een super goed moederbord met alles wat je nodig hebt. Een aanrader!
Avec l'arrivée de Windows 11 je suis énervé que les constructeurs ne mettent pas a disposition les puces TPM sur les cartes. Sinon bonne carte.Jamais déçu avec Gigabyte !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 26, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Bought it for my second build working as expected
